# 证书颁发

方法：`POST: /cert`

说明：申请颁发证书

请求参数列表：

| 名称        | 类型        | 说明  |
| ------------- |-------------| -----|
| `outId` | String	 | 应用内部对证书的标识，必须  |
| `userName` | String	 | 姓名，必须  |
| `userSurname` | String	 | 别名  |
| `userSerialnumber` | String	 | 序号 |
| `userEmail` | String	 | 邮箱，必须  |
| `userOrganization` | String	 | 单位  |
| `userOrgunit` | String	 | 部门  |
| `userCountry` | String	 | 国家  |
| `userState` | String	 | 省  |
| `userLocality` | String	 | 市  |
| `userStreet` | String	 | 街道  |
| `userTitle` | String	 | 职位  |
| `userDescription` | String	 | 描述  |
| `userAdditionalField` N(1~10) | string	| 证书支持10个自定义扩展属性  |
| `certValidity` | int	 | 证书有效期天数  |

响应数据列表:

| 名称        | 类型        | 说明  |
| ------------- |-------------| -----|
| `id` | String	 |   证书唯一ID    |
| `status` | String	 |   用户证书序列号    |
| `serialNumber` | String	 |   用户证书序列号    |
| `signBuf` | String	 |   公钥证书base64编码    |
| `signBufP7`| String | P7格式证书 |
| `startAt`| String | 证书开始日期 |
| `EndAt`| String | 证书结束日期 |

示例：

```
curl -v -H "Content-Type:application/json" -H "App-Key:9b5062s452mdf4d6" -H "Nonce:dbe32ds53EioQeIpypj" -H "Timestamp:1457492931" -H "Signature:6e2e85f40b96d8cf7c1d5a585ce6522d" -X POST -d '{"outId": "1101021234312453321","userName":"张三", "userEmail": "zhagnsan@trustedsign.com", "userCountry": "CN", "userState":"Beijing", "certValidity":"365", "userAdditionalField1": "男", "userAdditionalField2": "IT"}' http://127.0.0.1:8080/app/cert
```

HTTP请求
	
```
POST /file/upload HTTP/1.1
Host: api.trustedsign.com
App-Key: 9b5062s452mdf4d6
Nonce: dbe32ds53EioQeIpypj
Timestamp: 1457492931
Signature: 6e2e85f40b96d8cf7c1d5a585ce6522d
Content-Type: application/json;charset:UTF-8
{"outId": "1101021234312453321","userName":"张三", "userEmail": "zhagnsan@trustedsign.com", "userCountry": "CN", "userState":"Beijing", "certValidity":"365", "userAdditionalField1": "男", "userAdditionalField2": "IT"}
```

HTTP响应

```
{
  "id": "56df94a4421aa917a34e1155",
  "out_id": "",
  "userName": "张三",
  "userEmail": "zhagnsan@trustedsign.com",
  "Status": "VALID",
  "serialNumber": "786C629C044C5F5F562176C9B8B9E35D42C3F8CA",
  "signBuf": "",
  "signBufP7": "",
  "startAt": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "endAt": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "createdAt": "2016-03-09T11:12:36.292728725+08:00"
}
```
